After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.KPIS: Average response time to customer inquiries
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to customer inquiries.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Inquiries / Number of Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of customer issues resolved on the first call.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: (Number of Issues Resolved on First Call / Total Number of Calls) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures customers' satisfaction with how their inquiries are handled.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Inquiry Handling

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.KPIS: Number of inquiries resolved per agent
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures the productivity of customer service agents.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: Total Number of Inquiries Resolved / Total Number of Agents

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.KPIS: Quality of responses to customer inquiries
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures how well responses to customer inquiries meet quality standards.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Responses to Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.KPIS: Percentage of inquiries escalated to higher levels
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of inquiries that need to be escalated.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: (Number of Inquiries Escalated / Total Number of Inquiries) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.KPIS: Accuracy of information provided in responses
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: Measures how accurate the information provided to customers is.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Responses / Total Number of Responses) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve complex customer inquiries.
After Sales+Customer Service+Customer In.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Complex Inquiries / Number of Complex Inquiries
